importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when Netflix officially announced the new Kennedy family series.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The show spans from the 1930s to 1956, covering the formative years of the Kennedy family and the rise of Jack Kennedy.

keyTakeAways: Netflix is launching a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956'.
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family.
The story begins in the 1930s and traces the ascent of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The show is described as a blend of American mythology and a nuanced exploration of human struggles, with a focus on the family's influence on American history.
The series is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story' about JFK Jr. and will run for eight episodes.
It does not yet have a release date.

namedEntities.name: Netflix

namedEntities.name: Michael Fassbender
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He stars as Joe Kennedy, Sr., the patriarch of the Kennedy family, bringing a major celebrity to the series.

namedEntities.name: Fredrik Logevall
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Author of a biography on the Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His book 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956' serves as the basis for the series, providing historical depth and authenticity.

namedEntities.name: Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The series centers on the Kennedy family, highlighting their political legacy, personal struggles, and cultural impact.

namedEntities.name: Joe Kennedy, Sr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The patriarch of the Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is the central character in the series, portrayed by Michael Fassbender, and represents the foundation of the Kennedy political dynasty.

namedEntities.name: John F. Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The 35th U.S. President, son of Joe Kennedy, Sr.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His rise to presidency and tragic assassination are part of the Kennedy family’s legacy, which the series explores as part of its narrative.

namedEntities.name: JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Son of John F. Kennedy, who died in a plane crash
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His death along with his wife and sister-in-law reinforces the 'Kennedy curse' narrative, adding emotional and tragic depth to the series.

namedEntities.name: Sam Shaw
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He provided a statement about the show’s narrative depth, emphasizing its relevance to modern American identity.

namedEntities.name: Ryan Murphy
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His upcoming series 'American Love Story' focusing on JFK Jr. is contrasted with the new Netflix series, clarifying distinct narrative focuses.

namedEntities.name: American mythology
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The Kennedy family is described as embodying American mythology, suggesting the series taps into a deeper cultural fascination with power and legacy.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956.' The series, set to begin in the 1930s, stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the rise and struggles of the Kennedy family, including the personal and political challenges faced by Jack Kennedy and the tragic events surrounding JFK Jr. The show is described as a blend of American myth and human drama, offering insight into both the Kennedy legacy and broader American history. It is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming series on JFK Jr. and will consist of eight episodes, though a release date has not yet been announced.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
